casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Vernell SMITH, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Emmon Smith. No. 13-1190. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014. Case below, 131 So.3d 18 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District, denied.
